task.title: How to Add a Publishing Template to the Publishing Templates Gallery

steps.stepsection: To add the publishing template to your templates gallery, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open the transformation scenario dialog box.
In the Templates tab, click the Configure Publishing Templates Gallery link to.
step.stepresult: This will open the DITA/Publishing preferences pageDITA/Publishing preferences page.

step.cmd: Click the Add button and specify the location of your template directory.
step.stepresult: Your template directory is now added to the Additional Publishing Templates Galleries list.

step.cmd: Click OK to return to the transformation scenario dialog box.
step.stepresult: All the templates contained in your template directory will be displayed first in the preview pane.
